column4: is it true that there is no official upgrade process from one version of ubuntu to another?
or to put it another way, how to upgrade from one ubuntu version to the next??
ubuntuguide.org has it
Warning! This is still in it's development stage. Only use it for experimental purposes
I was going Warthog to Hoary
What did gave you that error
no error. I am reading ubuntuguide like you said
http://ubuntuguide.org/#upgradehoarytobreezy
ufff.. Hoary to breeze is not warty to hoary
yes... I want warty to hoary
there are no docs for that
you need to use ubuntuguide for warty
ah! found that
thx.. strange that when you put in the hoary cd it doesn't offer to upgrade
I guess that it's not so smart that it would know to offer you upgrading when you insert some cd in, and it most often needs net to upgrade
I mean it complains that there is an existing install without offering to upgrade it
it's not like it can't recognise warty!
ahhh.. you mean that when you start the install from the cd..
exactly
well, don't know about it. but wild guess would be that there is a reason for that
:) laziness on the part of the unpaid developer ?
might be true aswell, dont really know :)
but I guess that they believe that about every user has net
